title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5903.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5903.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth the methods and
procedures governing the New York State Science and Technology Foundation
program of support for scientific and technological research, development and
education in New York State, the Research and Development Grants

Program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5903.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
